name: Indagator
storyline: Claudius cen Cato is an intelligence officer tasked with investigating Aulus mal Asina, the XIIth legion's senior magitek technician and alleged embezzler of imperial research funds. To find evidence of his wrongdoing he will have to earn his respect and his trust, but mal Asina is a dangerous man. Claudius must play his cards carefully if he wants to complete his mission, and more importantly, stay alive.
